Meet the Expert Maths Tutors at GG Maths

Our team of dedicated tutors shares a passion for helping students succeed. Each one brings a wealth of experience, strong academic credentials, and a commitment to delivering personalised, high-quality tuition.

Book a Free Consultation

Meet the Tutors

Giuliano Grasso

BSc Mathematics

GCSE & A-Level Maths

Founder of GG Maths with over a decade of full-time tutoring experience. He personally trains every tutor on our team to deliver our proven, systematic approach. Giuliano specialises in helping students jump multiple grades through targeted, systematic practice.

Gabriella Damas

MSc Physics, PhD in Quantum Physics

GCSE & A-Level Maths

Gabriella has more than ten years of experience teaching Maths and Physics, with expertise in algebra and probability. She is known for making difficult topics relatable through everyday examples and step-by-step problem-solving. Gabriella has helped students of all abilities succeed, including guiding one into medical school.

Rohan Jagpal

MEng Electrical and Electronic Engineering

GCSE & A-Level Maths (Pure & Mechanics)

Rohan is an enthusiastic, motivating tutor who works brilliantly with both confidence-builders and high-achievers. He teaches through visual, real-world examples and challenges students to test the depth of their understanding. His focus is on steady progress and genuine confidence.

Bruna Mot Barbosa

MSc Computer Science

GCSE & A-Level Maths

Based in Brazil, Bruna is a patient and supportive tutor with experience teaching at high school, university, and postgraduate levels. She specialises in logic to strengthen mathematical thinking and problem-solving. Bruna’s step-by-step approach builds confidence and ensures steady progress.

Alexandre Bidinotto

MSc Theoretical Physics

GCSE & A-Level Maths

Alexandre has over five years of experience helping students excel in Maths and Physics. He specialises in turning complex ideas into clear, engaging lessons, while encouraging independent thinking and problem-solving. His approach has guided students to high achievements, including success in the Brazilian Physics Olympiad.

Why Choose a GG Maths Tutor?

Hand-Picked for Excellence

Our tutors are selected not only for their academic expertise but also for their passion and ability to teach effectively.

Trained in Our Method

Every tutor is personally trained by founder Giuliano to deliver the GG Maths systematic approach, ensuring consistent, high-quality lessons.

Grade-Boosting Expertise

We know exactly what's required to achieve top grades, and we're skilled at boosting both grades and a student's self-belief.

Personalised to Your Child

We adapt our teaching style to each student's unique needs, ensuring they receive the support that works best for them.

Ongoing Support

We provide continuous support between lessons, so students can get quick answers and stay on track with their progress.

Ready to Work with the Perfect Tutor for Your Child?

Book your free consultation today and we’ll match you with the tutor best suited to your child’s goals and personality.
